title: Handle Cancellation Fee Dispute
description: A rider was charged a cancellation fee but claims the driver never showed up. The support agent must investigate.

tasks.description: Find the trip record associated with the cancellation fee.
Review the GPS data for both the rider and the driver at the time of the cancellation.
The data shows the driver was at the pickup pin for 5 minutes before cancelling. The rider's GPS was 3 blocks away.
tasks.expected_outcome: The evidence suggests the rider was not at the pickup location, and the fee is valid.

tasks.description: Deny the refund request and explain to the rider that the fee was valid because the driver waited at the location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the decision based on the available data.
